featured.text: After the war, a giant paperclip statue was erected in Oslo to 40 Vaaler—even though his design was never actually manufactured.
They were erected in memory of a deceased chief or a high-ranking clan member.
The structure, to be erected in the redeveloped areas of the capital’s 13th district, will cost 250 million francs (US$42 million).

definition.example: The statue was erected in the center of the park.
